Topic.Title: The young and Dumb investors are out of DELL

Message.Msg: If I read correctly Lenovo is gaining in the China market !!! China is not the only market, thoough very large ... Chinese believe in buying from China manufacturers ... Now, if Americans would believe in buying from American manufacturers, we will be " Up-and-Running " once more... Hang in there LONGS !!!

Message.Title: At this point, with $11.9 billion in cash and short-term equivalents, the business is only worth $6.6 billion.
Message.Msg: At this point, with $11.9 billion in cash and short-term equivalents, the business is only worth $6.6 billion. Devident date?

Message.Title: Bluetooth Dental Implants and Dell Police Cruisers.
Message.Msg: How long before investors find out out about the new investing horizons for dell and dental implant bluetooth technology? Just wondering cuase ever since i got my dental implant i have aliments in different parts of my vision and my wife complains of increased PMS cramping. Does anyone know?
